title: 14 Day Ban on this account
body:
So when do I get my account back time wise because my 14 days have finished and its 12:17 am 19/02/16 and I was banned on the 5/02/16. Was just wondering if I could get a support team member to tell me around what time I can start playing again Thank you :)

Also I have learn't my lesson and probably won't type in chat again {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hey Aerion,

You should've received an email about your ban, and the time should be listed. It will be the same time that the ban started so it'll be exactly 14 days long. You could submit a support ticket, but you'd be off your ban by the time they got to it.

You don't need to *not* type in chat to avoid a ban, just don't insult the other players or be annoyingly passive-aggressive or spammy. Mute anyone that is bugging you so you don't feel the need to respond to them. You can move the chat box off the screen if you want to.

-DTN
